detections.label: <<FORMULA_0354>>
detections.formula:
&\quad \langle 
abla h(	ilde \vz_{t+1}) + \vu_{t+1}, 	ilde \vz_{t+1} -  ar \vz_t angle \
     &= rac{1}{2 \lambda_{t+1}} \Vert 
abla h(	ilde \vz_{t+1}) + \vu_{t+1} + \lambda_{t+1} (	ilde \vz_{t\times1} -  ar \vz_t) \Vert^2 \
     &\quad -  rac{1}{2 \lambda_{t+1} } \Vert 
abla h(	ilde \vz_{t+1}) + \vu_{t+1} \Vert^2  -  rac{\lambda_{t+1}}{2} \Vert 	ilde \vz_{t+1} -  ar \vz_t \Vert^2.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0497>>
detections.formula:
&\quad f(\vx^{\rm out},\vy^*(\vx^{\rm out})) - f(\vx^*(\vy^{\rm out}),\vy^{\rm out}) \\
 &= f(\vx^{\rm out},\vy^*(\vx^{\rm out})) -  f(\vx^{\rm out},\vy^{\rm out}) - f(\vx^{\rm out},\vy^{\rm out}) -  f(\vx^*(\vy^{\rm out}),\vy^{\rm out}) \\
 &\le \langle \nabla_x f(\vx^{\rm out},\vy^{\rm out}) + \vu^{\rm out}, \vx^*(\vy^{\rm out}) -\vx^{\rm out} \rangle \\
 &\quad + \langle - \nabla_y f(\vx^{\rm out},\vy^{\rm out}) + \vv^{\rm out},  \vy^*(\vx^{\rm out}) - \vy^{\rm out} \rangle.
detections.error_description: When adding and subtracting f(x_out, y_out), the second occurrence has the wrong sign; it should be +f(x_out, y_out) (i.e., A - B = A - C + C - B), not -f(x_out, y_out).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0435>>
detections.formula:
-f(\vx_1,\vy_2) + f(\vx_1,\vy_1) &\ge \langle -\nabla_y f(\vx_1,\vy_1) +\vv_1, \vy_2 - \vy_1 \rangle + \frac{\mu}{p} \Vert \vy_2 - \vy_1 \Vert^p, \quad \vv_1\in \partial \gI_{\gY}(\vy_1);  \\
    -f(\vx_2,\vy_1) + f(\vx_2,\vy_2) &\ge  \langle -\nabla_y f(\vx_2,\vy_2) + \vv_2, \vy_1 - \vy_2 \rangle + \frac{p}{\mu} \Vert \vy_2 - \vy_1 \Vert^p, \quad \vv_2 \in \partial \gI_{\gY} (\vy_2).
detections.error_description: In the second inequality, the uniform concavity term is written as (p/µ)||y2−y1||^p, but it should be (µ/p)||y2−y1||^p (same as the first inequality).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0434>>
detections.formula:
f(\vx_2,\vy_1) - f(\vx_1,\vy_1) &\ge \langle \nabla_x f(\vx_1,\vy_1) + \vu_1, \vx_2 - \vx_1 \rangle + \frac{\mu}{p} \Vert \vx_2 - \vx_1 \Vert^p, \quad \vu_1 \in \partial \gI_{\gX} (\vx_1); \\
    f(\vx_1,\vy_2) - f(\vx_2,\vy_2) &\ge \langle \nabla_x f(\vx_2, \vy_2) + \vu_2, \vx_1 - \vx_2 \rangle + \frac{\mu}{p} \Vert \vx_2 - \vx_1 \Vert^p, \quad \vu_2 \in \partial \gI_{\gX} (\vx_2).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0071>>
detections.formula:
\langle \mF(\bar \vz) + \nabla \mF(\bar \vz)(\vz - \bar \vz) + \frac{\gamma}{2} \Vert \vz - \bar \vz \Vert (\vz - \bar \vz), \vz' - \vz  \rangle \ge 0, ~\forall \vz' \in \gZ; \\
    \vu =  -\left(\mF(\bar\vz) + \nabla \mF(\bar \vz) (\vz - \bar \vz) + \frac{\gamma}{2} \Vert \vz - \bar \vz \Vert 
    (\vz- \bar \vz)  \right) \in 
    \begin{bmatrix}
        \partial \gI_{\gX} (\vx) \\
        -\partial \gI_{\gY}(\vy)
    \end{bmatrix},
detections.error_description: The normal-cone term is written with a negative sign on the Y block: u ∈ [∂I_X(x); -∂I_Y(y)]. It should be u ∈ ∂I_Z(z) = [∂I_X(x); ∂I_Y(y)] without the minus.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0356>>
detections.error_description: The term uses f(tilde z_{t+1}) where it should be h(tilde z_{t+1}); additionally, the gradient is evaluated at tilde z_{t×1} instead of tilde z_{t+1} (index typo).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0346>>
detections.error_description: The inequality after the equality is reversed: replacing g_{t+1} with ∇h(\tilde z_{t+1}) and bounding the error terms by δ should produce an upper bound (≤), not a lower bound (≥).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0074>>
detections.formula:
\vz = \arg & \min_{\vz' \in \gZ}  \left\{ 
    f(\vz') + \langle 
abla f( ar \vz), \vz' -  ar \vz angle +  rac{1}{2} \langle 
abla^2 f( ar \vz) (\vz' -  ar \vz), \vz' -  ar \vz angle +  rac{\gamma}{6} \Vert \vz' -  ar \vz \Vert^3
    ight\}; \
    \vu &= - ( 
abla f( ar \vz) + 
abla^2 f( ar \vz) (\vz -  ar \vz) +  rac{\gamma}{2} \Vert \vz -  ar \vz \Vert (\vz-   ar \vz) ) \in \partial \gI_{\gZ}(\vz).
detections.error_description: In the cubic model, the first term should be the constant f(\bar \vz), but it is written as f(\vz'). This conflicts with the subsequent optimality condition (which lacks a \nabla f(\vz) term).

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0508>>
detections.error_description: Both inequalities have a squared norm on the left but only a first-power norm on the right; the RHS norms should be squared (or the LHS unsquared) to be consistent.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0511>>
detections.error_description: In the second inequality, the coefficient is written as 1/\gamma/2^{1/2} instead of 1/(\gamma/2)^{1/2}, altering the intended scaling.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0592>>
detections.formula:
&\quad \eta_t^2 \Vert \mF(\vz_{t+1/2}) - \tilde \mF(\vz_{t+1/2}) \Vert^2 \\
    &\le 2 \eta_t^2 \Vert \mF(\vz_{t+1/2}) - \mF(\vz_t) - \nabla \mF(\vz_t) (\vz_{t+1/2} - \vz_t) \Vert^2 \\
    &\quad + 2 \eta_t^2 \Vert (\nabla \mF(\vz_t) - \nabla \mF(\vz_{\pi(t)}) (\vz_{t+1/2} - \vz_t) \Vert^2 \\
    &\le \frac{\eta_t^2 \rho^2}{2} \Vert \vz_{t+1/2} - \vz_t \Vert^4  + 2 \eta_t^2 \rho^2 \Vert \vz_t - \vz_{\pi(t)} \Vert^2 \Vert \vz_{t+1/2} - \vz_t \Vert^2  \\
    &= \frac{\rho^2}{8 \gamma^2} \Vert \vz_{t+1/2} - \vz_t \Vert^2 + \frac{\rho^2}{2\gamma^2} \Vert \vz_t - \vz_{\pi(t)} \Vert^2.
detections.error_description: In the third line, the Jacobian-difference product lacks closing parentheses; it should read || (∇F(z_t) − ∇F(z_{π(t)})) (z_{t+1/2} − z_t) ||^2.

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0574>>
detections.formula:
\langle \mF(\bar \vz) + \nabla \mF(\vz_{\rm ss})(\vz - \bar \vz) + \frac{\gamma}{2} \Vert \vz - \bar \vz \Vert (\vz - \bar \vz), \vz' - \vz  \rangle \ge 0, ~\forall \vz' \in \gZ; \\
    \vu =  -\left(\mF(\bar\vz) + \nabla \mF(\vz_{\rm ss}) (\vz - \bar \vz) + \frac{\gamma}{2} \Vert \vz - \bar \vz \Vert

detections.label: <<FORMULA_0589>>
detections.error_description: The final inequality sign is reversed. From the first-order optimality conditions, one should obtain ≤ (not ≥): η_t⟨F(z_{t+1/2}), z_{t+1}−z⟩ ≤ ⟨z_{t+1}−z_t, z−z_{t+1}⟩ and η_t⟨˜F(z_{t+1/2}), z_{t+1/2}−z_{t+1}⟩ ≤ ⟨z_{t+1/2}−z_t, z_{t+1}−z_{t+1/2}⟩.
